title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Augmented Reality-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematical concepts (equations, geometry)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can solve 3D geometry problems in AR environments with 85% accuracy
Explain at least two application examples of derivative concepts using augmented reality simulation tools
Design a multi-step (at least three) collaborative problem-solving process with peers on a collaborative AR platform

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
